title: Emerald Chess Android Wear
summary: With Emerald Chess you can play chess on your android wear device

descriptionHTML:
Emerald Chess is chess for android wear. Play the classic game on your wrist, against a friend or a computer. Featuring 3 different difficulty modes to challenge players of all levels. Wear Chess. is part of our. Wear Games. series.

For the first time players can play the great classic game of chess on their smart watches. Emerald Chess is the first chess game on the market and the first chess app developed for smart watches.

The game will be sure to entertain you for a very long time. Our challenging Deep Green AI™ will push you to your limits enjoy hours of fun with. Chess Wear.

We also welcome customer feedback and seek to provide nothing short of the best quality apps on the market, if you find a problem with the app don't hesitate to get in contact.

This android wear game is available for all devices, including the moto 360, samsung gear live, sony smartwatch 3, lg g watch and more.

**PERMISSIONS**
There are many permissions required for this application including internet access, accounts access and more, these are for the online-multiplayer features we are working on at the moment. We take our user's privacy very seriously and do not make use of these permissions without the explicit consent of the user.

** FEATURES COMING SOON **

- Online Multiplayeru
- CPU vs CPU games

Email: callan102@gmail.com for any queries related to this app
comments: Moto 360 2nd gen touch issue On the moto 360 2nd (46 inch) gen the corners are just barely selectable. But not reliable. Feels like trying to select a single pixel. Often I tap multiple times and accidentally move the wrong piece. It is frustrating. Would rate this higher if this issue is resolved.                 UPDATE: thanks for responding so quickly! unfortunately the app now keeps crashing when I try to launch it... UPDATE: works now!

Bought and played or tried to play on my LG G Watch. It doesn't have no different color boards or pieces. Looks all bland and washed out over time! It also stays stuck on my watch with no option to exit (gotta let the watch screen shut off. Where's the difficulty level?
Works again Update to watch caused crash, support got on it fix quickly and the chess games works great again.
Sony Smartwatch 3 - doesn't start at all... totally unable to play.... please fix! I've heard good things. Will up rating when it works.
Beautiful This is a great app, Ive never lost to the cpu but quite fun. Surprisingly easy to use, only messes up every once and awhile. Id like to see an undo button
Great app I didn't think it would be playable, fat fingers small watch. I got an ink pen with a stylist. Very fun. It's perfect!
recentChanges: Fixed cut off corners in newer devices
